## DataLoaderOptions interface

Options for data loader

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DataLoaderOptions extends PluginOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [autoLoadData](./grid.dataloaderoptions.autoloaddata.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that grid should try to load data at the end of init phase |
|  [debounceDataCallback](./grid.dataloaderoptions.debouncedatacallback.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of miliseconds that are used for debounce call of dataCallback |
